Face Covering Tips

1- Gradually have your child begin to wear their mask at home for longer periods of time.
2- Depending on age, pick out a fun mask your child may like such as sports team or super hero.
3- Try and be positive toward the policy and use simple words when explaining the reasons for wearing masks.
4- Communicate with teacher on how effective your child has been in wearing the mask. Give age appropriate praises/rewards for adhering to the policy.
